name: Office Heat
description:
NOTE: The game has some slight audio issues in some browsers (e.g., Chrome). For the optimal experience, the downloadable version is recommended.

Tips for playing:

  • Click to advance/skip dialogue.
  • Click on objects to investigate them.
  • Click on objects a second time to learn more.
  • Click on items in your inventory to learn more about them.
  • Drag items from your inventory onto objects to use them.
  • Some items may become more useful after you have used other items on the same object.
  • It's best to explore first before using items.
  • Even if you know which item to use, it might be fun to try something else :)

You can press F11 to toggle fullscreen if desired.

Pressing Escape will immediately quit the game.

HINT IF YOU'RE STUCK Use the sauce, Luke. MINIMAL WALKTHROUGH

Click thermostat, clippers, hot sauce, paper.

Open the cupboard:

  1. Click cupboard. Click cupboard again.
  2. Use clippers on cupboard.
  3. Use hot sauce on cupboard.
  4. Click wrench, bug spray.

Attempt to fix the thermostat:

  1. Use wrench on thermostat.
  2. Use hot sauce on thermostat.

Remove wasp from bin:

  1. Click rubbish bin.
  2. Use bug spray on rubbish bin.
  3. Use hot sauce on rubbish bin.
  4. Click sandwich.

Solve the mouse hole:

  1. Click mouse hole.
  2. Use sandwich on mouse hole.
  3. Use hot sauce on mouse hole.
  4. Click key.

Open desk drawer:

  1. Click desk drawer. Click desk drawer again.
  2. Use key on desk drawer.
  3. Use hot sauce on desk drawer.
  4. Use hot sauce on water cooler.
  5. Use hot sauce on desk drawer.
  6. Click ink and the sticky note for the current day.

Unlock the computer:

  1. Click computer. Click computer again.
  2. Use sticky note on computer.
  3. Use hot sauce on computer.
  4. Click computer.

Fix the printer:

  1. Click printer. Click printer again.
  2. Use ink on printer.
  3. Use hot sauce on printer.
  4. Click printer.
  5. Use paper on printer.

Fix the thermostat:

  1. Use paper on thermostat.
  2. Use hot sauce on thermostat.
